授業方法:
1. Classes will be conducted in English only and English will be the means of communication between the students and the instructor. (Students will also be expected to communicate with one another in English.)
2. Students are encouraged to actively participate in class discussions, both independently and collaboratively, in order to enhance their competence and confidence in English and also to create a better learning environment for all.

第1回: You will be required to complete listening and vocabulary exercises for homework requiring approximately 1 hour to complete.
第2回: Unit 1: SOCIOLOGY - Names
You will be required to complete listening and vocabulary exercises for homework requiring approximately 1 hour to complete.
第3回: Unit 2: LINGUISTICS Global - English
You will be required to complete listening and vocabulary exercises for homework requiring approximately 1 hour to complete.
第4回: Unit 3: PSYCHOLOGY - Phobias
You will be required to complete listening and vocabulary exercises for homework requiring approximately 1 hour to complete.
第5回: Unit 4: BUSINESS - Success in the Global Economy
You will be required to complete listening and vocabulary exercises for homework requiring approximately 1 hour to complete.
第6回: Unit 5: EDUCATION - How We Each Learn Best
You will be required to complete listening and vocabulary exercises for homework requiring approximately 1 hour to complete.
第7回: Unit 6: HISTORY - The Silk Road
You will be required to complete listening and vocabulary exercises for homework requiring approximately 1 hour to complete.
第8回: Unit 7: SOCIAL PSYCHOLOGY - Sports Fans
You will be required to complete listening and vocabulary exercises for homework requiring approximately 1 hour to complete.
第9回: Unit 8: ARCHITECTURE - Frank Gehry
You will be required to complete listening and vocabulary exercises for homework requiring approximately 1 hour to complete.
第10回: Unit 9: PUBLIC HEALTH - Global Epidemic
You will be required to complete listening and vocabulary exercises for homework requiring approximately 1 hour to complete.
第11回: Unit 10: URBAN PLANNING - 21st Century Cities
You will be required to complete listening and vocabulary exercises for homework requiring approximately 1 hour to complete. Additionally you will need to prepare for a group presentation.
第12回: Unit 11: BIOLOGY - DNA Testing
You will be required to complete listening and vocabulary exercises for homework requiring approximately 1 hour to complete. Additionally you will need to prepare for a group presentation.
第13回: Unit 12: PUBLIC ADMINISTRATION - Risk Management
You will be required to complete listening and vocabulary exercises for homework requiring approximately 1 hour to complete. Additionally you will need to prepare for a group presentation.
第14回: You will be required to complete listening and vocabulary exercises for homework requiring approximately 1 hour to complete. Additionally you will need to prepare for a group presentation.

name: 【150】英語II（コミュニケーション）　９／English II (Communication)
担当者: コンデン　Ｒ．Ｇ．（CONDON ROBERT GRAHAM）
成績評価備考:
備考　Note
The student’s grade will be based on quizzes, writing assignments, and oral presentations. No final exam will be given during the exam period. Those students who miss five or more classes during the term will receive 0 points for this course.
